title: Can I use my phone as a USB flash drive?
answer:
Yes. You can connect your phone to a computer using a USB cable to view content in the microSD card but not the internal storage.

Choose a connection mode:

l Media device (MTP): MTP stands for Media Transfer Protocol. In this mode, you can synchronize media files between your phone and a computer that supports MTP.

l HiSuite: In this mode, you can use HiSuite to manage photos, songs, messages, contacts, and applications on your phone.

l [Charge only: In this mode, you can use a computer to charge your phone.]()

l [[USB flash drive: This mode requires your phone to have a microSD card installed. In this mode, files can be transmitted between the microSD card and the connected computer, and the microSD card is temporarily unavailable.]()]()

[When your phone is connected to a Mac in MTP mode, you can manage files on your phone, but the dial-up connection function on the Mac is unavailable.]()
